gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 115, Pelicans 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Ja Morant leads the Grizzlies with 34 points, six rebounds and eight assists, including the game-winning driving floater as time expires to lift Memphis over the Pelicans, 115-113. Jaren Jackson Jr. (24 points, six rebounds) and Desmond Bane (21 points, five assists) combined for 45 in the victory, while Brandon Ingram led the Pelicans with 34 points, four rebounds and six assists in the losing effort. The Grizzlies snap a 5-game losing streak and improve to 7-19 on the season, while the Pelicans fall to 16-12.
